title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs with a single command-line tool; ships Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. and exposes a local OpenAI-compatible API.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and asyncio wrapper for the Ollama API; install via pip and chat with local models in 3 lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; identical API surface to the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that turns any Ollama model into a drop-in LLM for chains, agents, RAG, tool-calling, etc.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG, admin panel, dark mode.

title: llama-cpp-python with Ollama example
summary: Drop-in C++ backend for Ollama models; exposes OpenAI API and can be swapped into Ollama for ARM/NVIDIA acceleration.

title: ollama-haystack by deepset
summary: Haystack component that lets you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-copilot (vscode extension)
summary: VS-Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as a free Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot (Streamlit template)
summary: Ready-to-fork Streamlit app: upload PDFs, generate embeddings, chat with a local Ollama model using Retrieval-Augmented Generation.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-grade Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama4j (Java SDK)
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; synchronous & async APIs, streaming, Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-tools (pip package)
summary: Tiny helper that automatically generates OpenAI-style function-calling metadata for Ollama chat completions.

title: ollama-gui (Tauri desktop app)
summary: Lightweight cross-platform desktop client for Ollama built with Tauri & Svelte; works offline, no Electron.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server in containers.

title: ollama-cli (community Go CLI)
summary: Enhanced Go CLI that wraps ollama with batch prompts, conversation history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you run local LLMs via Ollama for note Q&A, summarization, and brainstorming.

title: ollama-nim (Nim wrapper)
summary: Nim language wrapper around the Ollama REST API with async HTTP and streaming support.

title: ollama-rust (unofficial SDK)
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama; includes chat, generate, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-csharp (.NET client)
summary: Community-maintained C# client for .NET 6+; supports chat, completion, embeddings, and model pulling.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Simple Python bot that exposes Ollama models to Discord users via slash commands; configurable roles and rate limits.
